header: Stay safe from phishing and online scams by following these best practices recommended by cybersecurity experts and banks.

items.title: Verify Official URLs
items.content: Always double-check the URL in the browser address bar. Phishing sites often use slightly misspelled names like "sbi-bank.net" instead of "onlinesbi.sbi".

items.title: Avoid Sponsored Links
items.content: Search results often show "Sponsored" ads at the top. These are frequently used by scammers. Always scroll down to the organic search results or use verified directories.

items.title: Protect Your OTP & PIN
items.content: Bank staff will never ask for your OTP, CVV, or Login Password. If someone asks for these details over a call or message, it is a scam.

items.title: Use Official Apps Only
items.content: Download banking apps only from official stores (Google Play or Apple App Store). Avoid side-loading apps or clicking on "update" links sent via SMS.
